warnings.auto-placement: Auto-placement of grid cells is not supported on IE11. Hence, Powergrid restricts spanning of cells beyond configured number of columns. See details.
warnings.auto-grid-template: 'auto' value specified in grid configuration behaves differently in IE than in modern browsers. See details.
warnings.fit-content: fit-content() isn't IE friendly. Don't worry, there's a workaround.
warnings.grid-alignment: IE11 doesn't support grid level alignment 'justify-items', 'align-items'. See details.
warnings.grid-gap: Grid gutters are not supported in IE11. Use a workaround.
